snippet: Wall Street closed higher on Friday, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-share index reaching a record intraday high and Google rising above $1,000 a share.
abstract: Stocks rise as investors shift their focus away from political crisis and toward surprisingly good quarterly reports from wide range of companies.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street closed higher on Friday, with the Standard & Poor’s 500-share index reaching a record intraday high and Google rising above $1,000 a share.

headline.main: Investors’ Eye on Profit Pushes S.&P. Higher
headline.print_headline: Investors’ Eye on Profit Pushes S.&P. Higher
